column4: What's the equivalent of, say, Windows taskmanager in Ubuntu?
if you have enough ram you can pass toram at boot and use your cd-burner
How much ram do I need? I think I have enough ~1gb
I am not sure if it will run in 1g .. I haven't tried .. chances are if  you are on the live cd the burner will work in an actual install
How can I check if it has at least properly detected it?
